message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. I'm willing to pay a fair price, but I'm on a budget.
I understand you're on a budget, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $125. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit higher than $125. I'm willing to pay $110 for the product. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.
I understand you're still a bit off, Bob! I'm willing to make another counteroffer. I'm proposing $115. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll be happy with the price.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $112.50. I think that's a fair price for both of us.
I'm getting close, Bob! I'm willing to make another counteroffer. I'm proposing $114. It's a slight increase from my previous offer, but I think it's still a great deal for you.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $112. I think that's the best I can do. I'm hoping we can finalize the deal at this price.
I'm not ready to give up yet, Bob! I'm willing to make one more counteroffer. I'm proposing $113. It's a small increase from your latest offer, but I think it's still a fair price for the product.
I'm willing to meet you at $112, Alice. This is my final offer. I'm not willing to pay more than that. I'm hoping we can finalize the deal at this price.
